17b1('bum): lha 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i tshig bla dgas byang chu sems pad 'gyur
17b2('bum): lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ snal byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ba de sems dbu
17b3('bum): 'gyur/ sna ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma m-i dmig na
17b4('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dang 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la chis/ lce la byang chub sa ma
17b5('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ldem chis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce ma mchis pa byang rku sems dpa' ra gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ 
17b6('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// lus ma legs pa gzhan byang chub
17b7('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ lus la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dad la lus mchis 'ar yang ga la 'gyur/ lus ma
17b8('bum): mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi tshig bla dgas bya
18a1('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ yid sa lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang gal mchis/ ying la byang dub sems dpar
18a2('bum): mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yingad mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ ying ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lnga'ang ga la bachis// bcom ldan 'das
18a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs ma lags pa gzhan byang chu
18a4('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs mchis par yang gal zhu
18a5('bum): gzugs ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta' ngag la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sgra'i tshig bla dgas
18a6('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ sgra la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang
18a7('bum): nub sems dpa' la sgra mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sgra ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
18a8('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la dri'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ dri ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ dri la byang chub sems
18b1('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ dri ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
18b2('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la re'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ro ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang
18b3('bum): ga la mchis/ ro la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ro mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ro ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang
18b4('bum): ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'angag la
18b5('bum): mchis/ reg ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dang ra 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ reg la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub
18b6('bum): sems dpa' la lem mchis par yang ga la gyur/ reg ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa' ba gyur ba lnga 'angag la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mi
18b7('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chos kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chos ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la
18b8('bum): mchis/ chos la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la chos mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chos ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar
19a1('bum): 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shi du mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la mig gi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
19a2('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mig gi khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ mig gi khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur
19a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ mig gi khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
19a4('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyu rab lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams ma lags pa gzhan
19a5('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ gzug/ sa kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi kham
19a6('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs
19a7('bum): na/ de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa'
19a8('bum): 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i kham
19b1('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
19b2('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la rna ba'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis
19b3('bum): rna ba'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang g.yo 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i khams mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ rna ba'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems
19b4('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sgra'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
19b5('bum): dbar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra'i khams ma lags ba gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sgra'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis
19b6('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sgra'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta'ang gang mchis
19b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
19b8('bum): blta ga la mchis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la
20a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam
20a2('bum): par shes pa'i khams ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ 
20a3('bum): sna'i khams kyi tshig tha dgus/ byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ sna'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba lnga 'angag lam ma
20a4('bum): sna'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sna'i khams
20a5('bum): ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems da nga' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la dri'i
20a6('bum): khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ dri'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ dri'i
20a7('bum): khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ dri'i khams ma mchis pa/ 
20a8('bum): chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i rnam par shes
20b1('bum): nga'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta'ang
20b2('bum): ga la mchis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mchis
20b3('bum): bar yang ga la 'gyur/ sna'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
20b4('bum): ma mchis shing mi dbigs na/ de la lce'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i khams ma lag pa gzhan byang
20b5('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis// lha'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i khams
20b6('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing
20b7('bum): mi dmigs na/ de la re'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ re'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag
20b8('bum): la mchis/ re'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la re'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ re'i khams
21a1('bum): ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na
21a2('bum): de la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chog bla dgas byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lha'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub
21a3('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i rnam par shes
21a4('bum): pa'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dang ra 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
21a5('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems ngabar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lus kyi khams ma lag
21a6('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis// lus kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi
21a7('bum): khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lus kyi khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
21a8('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg bya'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg bya'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag
21b1('bum): la mchis/ reg bya'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg bya'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg bya'i khams ma
21b2('bum): mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas
21b3('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lus kyi rnam par shes khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la
21b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mchis pa ra yang gal 'du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis
21b5('bum): ba byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang
21b6('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang gal
21b7('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das ba
21b8('bum): chub sems dpa' shin du ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chos kyi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga ga la mchis/ chos kyi khams ma lags pa gzhan byang
22a1('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ chos kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi khams
22a2('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chos kyi khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs
22a3('bum): na/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar
22a4('bum): 'gyur ba lta 'angag la mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kha mas la byang chub singa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
22a5('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kha mas ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
22a6('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la
22a7('bum): mchis/ sa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sa'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems
22a8('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na// de la du'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la
22b1('bum): mchis/ chu'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ chu'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
22b2('bum): la tu'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chu'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang dub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
22b3('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la me'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas/ byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ me'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
22b4('bum): lta'ang ga la mchis/ me'i khams la byang dub sems dpa'amachis par yang gal 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la me'i khams mchis par yang ga la
22b5('bum): 'gyur/ me'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la ma mchis/ brtsa ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
22b6('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la rlung gi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rlung gi khams ma logs pa gzhan byang chub sems dab
22b7('bum): 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ rlung gi khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams mchis par yang gal
22b8('bum): 'gyur/ rlung gi khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs ra/ nga lanapa
23a1('bum): khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ na mkha'i khams ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag
23a2('bum): la mchis na mkha'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' lan mkha'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ nam
23a3('bum): mkha'i khams ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na
23a4('bum): de la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas/ byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan
23a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 
23a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis pa byang dub sems dpar 'gyur
23a7('bum): 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po stong phrag brgya pa// 
23a8('bum): / de la rig pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ma rig pa
23b1('bum): ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa' ra 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ ma rig pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems
23b2('bum): dpa' la ma rig pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ma rig pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sam
23b3('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la 'du byed kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ 'du byed ma lags pa gzhan byang chub
23b4('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 'du byed la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du
23b5('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du byed pa mchi sa pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
23b6('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi darigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas/ byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa
23b7('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes po la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems
23b8('bum): dpa' lo rnam par shes pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
24a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ming dang gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
24a2('bum): lnga ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis// ming dang gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la
24a3('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' ming dang gzugs mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
24a4('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi da migs na/ de la skye mched drugi shi bla dgas byang chu ba sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye mched
24a5('bum): drug mo lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ skye mched drug la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang
24a6('bum): chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye mched drug ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang
24a7('bum): chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg pa ma lags pa gzhan byang chub
24a8('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ reg pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis por yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg
24b1('bum): ba ma mchis par byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la tshor ba'i tshig bla dgas
24b2('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis// tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang
24b3('bum): ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ tsher ba ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
24b4('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sred pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sred pa ma lags pa gzhan byang
24b5('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sred ba la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sreng ba mchis
24b6('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ sred pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing ming rig
24b7('bum): na/ de la len pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpor 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lan pa ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems par 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ len
24b8('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la len pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ len pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
25a1('bum): lha'ang gal mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang dub sems dpa' shin tu ma bachis shing mi dmigs na/ de la srid pa'i rig bla dgas byung
25a2('bum): chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ srid pa ma lags pa gzhon byeng chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ srid pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis
25a3('bum): bar yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa mchis par yang gau la 'gyur/ srid pa ma mchis pa dang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ 
25a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la skye ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga
25a5('bum): la mchis/ skye ba mo lags pa gzhan byang chub sem sa bar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ skye ba la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur
25a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la smra ba mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'dog la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
25a7('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rga shi'i tshi go bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems
25a8('bum): ngabar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rga shi la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 
25b1('bum): rga shi ma mchis pa byang dub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi de
25b2('bum): bzhin nyid kyi tshig blo dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 
25b3('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ gzugs kyi de
25b4('bum): bzhin nyid ma mchis pa dang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sa mas dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la
25b5('bum): cher ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas bang chub sam sang par 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar
25b6('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpal tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi ches par yang ga
25b7('bum): la 'gyur/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi
25b8('bum): dmigs na/ de la 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar
26a1('bum): 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
26a2('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
26a3('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dalags gzhan byang chub sems rapar 'gyur ba
26a4('bum): lta 'ang ga la mchis/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du byed
26a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur/ blta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem sa dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnar shes
26a6('bum): pa 'di ba'i shing kyi tshig gra dgas byang chub se 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de
26a7('bum): bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yA ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis
26a8('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la mig gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
26b1('bum): blta ga la mchis/ mig gi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ mig gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 
26b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' mig gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rig gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
26b3('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyu
26b4('bum): blta'ang ga la mchis/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa 'al rna ba'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ rna ba'i
26b5('bum): bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems pa pa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i de bzhi
26b6('bum): nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba lnga 'ang ga la mchis/ sna'i de bzhin nyid la byang
26b7('bum): sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur// sna'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lto 'ang
26b8('bum): la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lce'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i
27a1('bum): de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/ lce'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ 
27a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ lce'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byed
27a3('bum): chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga ga la mchis/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
27a4('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi
27a5('bum): de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lus kyi de bzhi na nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'angag la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
27a6('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang
27a7('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi
27a8('bum): bzhin cing mchis par ring ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi badzin cing ma mchis 'byor chu'i sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ba dga'amatshom mngon pas byang chub sems da gsam
27b1('bum): mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa byang chub sems
27b2('bum): dbar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis
27b3('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing
27b4('bum): mi dmigs na/ de la sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
27b5('bum): blta 'ang ga la mchis/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub se mas dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur
27b6('bum): sgra 'di bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shan tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la dri'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig
27b7('bum): bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ dri'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
27b8('bum): dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la
28a1('bum): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la re'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga
28a2('bum): ga la mchis/ ro'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ re'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems
28a3('bum): dpa la ro'i nga bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur// re'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
28a4('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi mi gas na/ de la reg gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chu ba sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg gi de bzhin
28a5('bum): nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ reg gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub se mas dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems
28a6('bum): dpa' reg gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
28a7('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar
28a8('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur
28b1('bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la mig
28b2('bum): gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'
28b3('bum): ga la mchis/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang
28b4('bum): ga la 'gyur/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
28b5('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi khams kyi de ba zhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa'ang 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de
28b6('bum): bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la
28b7('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar
28b8('bum): 'gyur ba lnga 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
29a1('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag la
29a2('bum): mchis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
29a3('bum): mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma
29a4('bum): mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga lam chis/ rna ba'i khams kyi ngo bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
29a5('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/ rna nga'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la
29a6('bum): rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gral 'gyur/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
29a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// sgra'i khams kyi
29a8('bum): de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ byang chub
29b1('bum): sems dpa' la sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ 
29b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpang
29b3('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la ma smin pa'i ra shes ni khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gnan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
29b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par
29b5('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing
29b6('bum): mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sna'i khams de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems
29b7('bum): dbar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis
29b8('bum): bar yang ga la 'gyur/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmags mdes
30a1('bum): / dri'i khams pa pa na nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'angag la mchis/ dri'i
30a2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis
30a3('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
30a4('bum): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la ma ches/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhi na nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
30a5('bum): lta 'ang ga la mchis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i rnam par shes
30a6('bum): pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom
30a7('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i
30a8('bum): khams kyi ngo bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang gal
30b1('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag
30b2('bum): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la
30b3('bum): mchis/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ re'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la
30b4('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la re'i khams kyi de ba zhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ re'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
30b5('bum): lnga'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub se mas dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
30b6('bum): kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag
30b7('bum): la mchis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
30b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
31a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ 
31a2('bum): lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub
31a3('bum): sems dpa' la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
31a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg
31a5('bum): bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
31a6('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byung
31a7('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'angag la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
31a8('bum): nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
31b1('bum): lha 'ang ga la mchis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi rnam par shes
31b2('bum): ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom
31b3('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi
31b4('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par
31b5('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar
31b6('bum): 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas bang chub sems
31b7('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
31b8('bum): dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gal 'gyur/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub seng
32a1('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
32a2('bum): tshig bla dgas dang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga 'angag la mchis/ yid
32a3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par
32a4('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
32a5('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la si'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gan+da
32a6('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sil khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams
32a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
32a8('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags
32b1('bum): ba gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la du'i
32b2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
32b3('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas bang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
32b4('bum): gzhan dang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' ma ches par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la
32b5('bum): me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa dang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
32b6('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rlung gi kham
32b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid me lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang
32b8('bum): chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ 
33a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na// de la nam kha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
33a2('bum): lta ga la mchis/ na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par
33a3('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang
33a4('bum): ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shi na tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam par she sa pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
33a5('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chu bsems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rnam
33a6('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par
33a7('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lnga'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das pang chub sems dpa' shin
33a8('bum): tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mi reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
33b1('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' lam rig pa'i de
33b2('bum): bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
33b3('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
33b4('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin
33b5('bum): nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
33b6('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes
33b7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur
33b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'angag
34a1('bum): la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa
34a2('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
34a3('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar
34a4('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar
34a5('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la
34a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis
34a7('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la ma chis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas
34a8('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub
34b1('bum): sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar
34b2('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
34b3('bum): lha ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la
34b4('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis
34b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la
34b6('bum): mchis/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ sre dpa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang
34b7('bum): ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 
34b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lan pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ len
35a1('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga
35a2('bum): la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la len pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 
35a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ srid
35a4('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid mi lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 
35a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang
35a6('bum): ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems da pa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi migs na/ de la skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
35a7('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
35a8('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems
35b1('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta 'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
35b2('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma legs pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
35b3('bum): dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
35b4('bum): blta 'ang ga la mchis ste/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so// legs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems
35b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can ming dmi gas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmig sa pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gang yang 'di
35b6('bum): skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
35b7('bum): 'di gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sem/ 
35b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
36a1('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes kyi tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lnga ma lag sa// bcom
36a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed kyi tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// 
36a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas yin sum 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
36a4('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs rtag pa'i
36a5('bum): tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
36a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
36a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nga/ tsher ba rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// 
36a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ tshe rab mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ 
36b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig
36b2('bum): bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'
36b3('bum): zhes bya ba 'di/ 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
36b4('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba' di/ 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// 
36b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de/ ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di / 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin
36b6('bum): ska ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di
36b7('bum): rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nga lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
36b8('bum): du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas yin skam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
37a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di / gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
37a2('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas yin
37a3('bum): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ tsher ba bde
37a4('bum): ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ltam lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
37a5('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bco ma ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
37a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'ang / 'du shes bde ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan

37a8('bum): tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub se
37b1('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ 'du byed bde ba'i tshigs dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
37b2('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
37b3('bum): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ rnam par shes pa bde ba'i tshig bla dgas
37b4('bum): yin snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'
37b5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshi ga bla dgas yin skam 'am/ gsol pa/ ba com ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
37b6('bum): kyiso bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ 
37b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs
37b8('bum): bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
38a1('bum): sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ tshor ba bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ldam
38a2('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ tsher ba bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/

38a4('bum): bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du

38a8('bum): 'du byed bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

39a8('bum): bar shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
39b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs stong ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

40a5('bum): tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
40a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das

40b7('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ 'du byed patshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas

41a1('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra

41a5('bum): tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/

41a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshe rab smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol
41a8('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ 'du shes smon
41b1('bum): pa yong ba'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems

41b7('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin
41b8('bum): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na
42a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das tshe rab shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub
42a2('bum): sems dpa' tshor ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das 'du shes shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes kyi tshig bla
42a3('bum): dag su 'gyur ba lta ga la ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lnga ga la
42a4('bum): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom
42a5('bum): ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
42a6('bum): 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dag/ su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das rtag pa
42a7('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tsher brtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi
42a8('bum): dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub
42b1('bum): sems dpa' 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes mi rtag pa'i

42b3('bum): blta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis
