96a7('bum): mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 
96a8('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong / 
96b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyibacom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchi
96b2('bum): te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming nge ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phyi
96b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag
96b4('bum): par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchi
96b5('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
96b6('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis phyi
96b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pam dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong
96b8('bum): ba nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na// ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma ma
97a1('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag pa
97a2('bum): rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ bang chub sems dpa' zhes gang
97a3('bum): ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming
97a4('bum): de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chen popa stong pa nyid
97a5('bum): kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang da ga par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 
97a6('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming
97a7('bum): de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming nge ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
97a8('bum): thug sa ma mchis/ byid gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes
97b1('bum): mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang
97b2('bum): la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhan/ 
97b3('bum): ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'bal ba dang / 
97b4('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'du sa byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma darig
97b5('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
97b6('bum): ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming
97b7('bum): de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang // 'grib
97b8('bum): pam rimigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'angal ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu
98a1('bum): mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ming nga yang gnas pa ma mchis/ 
98a2('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs
98a3('bum): pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
98a4('bum): de ltar bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phe la ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi
98a5('bum): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mi chis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i
98a6('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thog ma dang tha
98a7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib bam dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel
98a8('bum): ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
98b1('bum): kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming da ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa
98b2('bum): ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs par mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan
98b3('bum): 'das de ltar bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ 
98b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar
98b5('bum): na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyi sa brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib
98b6('bum): pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bco ma ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong
98b7('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa mo mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
98b8('bum): mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ba mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
99a1('bum): gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ngos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
99a2('bum): 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad steng pa nyid kyi nga
99a3('bum): de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug param mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug par mchis
99a4('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su pa mthong ste/ bcom ldan
99a5('bum): 'das de ltar bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag bar rjes su ma mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
99a6('bum): zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ bin gyis brlabs pa
99a7('bum): ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom
99a8('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mi dmigs
99b1('bum): pastong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa
99b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
99b3('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su
99b4('bum): ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dngos be med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang
99b5('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis
99b6('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// 
99b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
99b8('bum): kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma rimigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong
100a1('bum): nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ ming ngem mchis pas/ de ltar

100a6('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom

100a8('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ming nge'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming nge ma mchis pa/

100b5('bum): 'das bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul
100b6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phral
100b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnasaming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma
100b8('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dbang po rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu ma mthong
101a1('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dbang po rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang dub sems dpa' zhes gang la

102a1('bum): slad du zhen/ ming nge ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis

102a8('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma ma che so// bcom ldan 'das
102b1('bum): bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib

102b5('bum): byams pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ ya ngadag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
102b6('bum): byams pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming nga gnas pa ma mchis
102b7('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis snying rje'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom

103a1('bum): snying rje'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming
103a2('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dga' ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu pa
103a3('bum): mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dga' ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par
103a4('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i ming de granas pa ma mchi sa/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na
103a5('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyi sa brlabs pa ma mchis so// bco ldan 'das bdag gi sa btang snyoms kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ 
103a6('bum): yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis btang snyoms kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems
103a7('bum): dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das btang snyoms kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming
103a8('bum): de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis// thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
103b1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba bzhi'i 'phel
103b2('bum): ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
103b3('bum): 'jug pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming nga gnas pa ma
103b4('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa mo mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa ngas rgyas rdza su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma
103b5('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom lda na 'das de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pam dmigs/ yang dag par
103b6('bum): rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
103b7('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// 
103b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos rjesu dran
104a1('bum): pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos
104a2('bum): rjesu dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis// thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming dem mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchi
104a3('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge 'dun rje su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bco
104a4('bum): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i 'a phel ba dang / 'grib pam dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gangs
104a5('bum): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun rje su dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming ngem
104a6('bum): mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshul khrims rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 
104a7('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis tshul khrims rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag
104a8('bum): par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims rjesu dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
104b1('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom
104b2('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis gtong ba rje su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma mamigs/ yang dag par rjesu mya mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis gtong ba rjesu dran pa'i 'phel
104b3('bum): ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gtong ba rjesu dran pa'i ming de'ang gnas
104b4('bum): ba ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming dem ma chis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa
104b5('bum): ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lha rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ 
104b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag gis lha rje su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gang gA
104b7('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das lnga rjesu dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming nge ma mchis pra/ 
104b8('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lus kyi rnam pa rje su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma
105a1('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa'i 'bel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag pa
105a2('bum): rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam pa rje su dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
105a3('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom
105a4('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis skyo ba rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis skyo ba rjesu dran pa'i
105a5('bum): 'dil ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming dug/ dgas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba rjesu dran pa'i
105a6('bum): ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma
105a7('bum): mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong
105a8('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
105b1('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dbugs byi nang du rgyu brjesu dran pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming nges
105b2('bum): mchis pas/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'chi ba rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong
105b3('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'chi ba rjesu dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming
105b4('bum): du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba rjesu dran pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i
105b5('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de gnas pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
105b6('bum): bdag gis sha'i mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sha'i mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs
105b7('bum): yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sha'i mig gi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ 
105b8('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug par mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma chi so// bac+doMs bdag gi
106a1('bum): sgra'i mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis lha'i mig gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ 
106a2('bum): dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i mig gi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
106a3('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// 
106a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'gri pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis
106a5('bum): shes rab kyi mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ 
106a6('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi mig gi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar
106a7('bum): na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs
106a8('bum): yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos kyi mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems
106b1('bum): dba' zhes gang la ming du ga dgas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi mig gi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te
106b2('bum): re ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
106b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'phel ba dang 'grib ma dmigs
106b4('bum): yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dang 'a zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mig gi ming de yang gnas pa
106b5('bum): ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming der mchi sa pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug
106b6('bum): pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par shes pa drug gi 'bel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma
106b7('bum): mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mngon par shes pa drug gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang
106b8('bum): ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa drug gi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ ming ngas
107a1('bum): mchis pas// de ltar na ming nge gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ba'i nag shes pa'i stabs
107a2('bum): bcu'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa pa darigs/ yang
107a3('bum): dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' nas gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ming de yang gnas pa pa ma mchis/ thug pa
107a4('bum): ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pam
107a5('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
107a6('bum): bdag gis mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pam dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi
107a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na
107a8('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma rimigs
107b1('bum): yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sam
107b2('bum): dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
107b3('bum): mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming nge gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
107b4('bum): bdag gis snying rje chen po'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis snying rje chen po'i
107b5('bum): 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag pa ra rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
107b6('bum): snying rje chen po'i ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming nge gnas pa ma
107b7('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma
107b8('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par
108a1('bum): rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ming nge yang gnas pa
108a2('bum): ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ 
108a3('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ 
108a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes
108a5('bum): gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye ba re len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i
108a6('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar
108a7('bum): lan pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 
108a8('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgya/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming nge yang gnas pas
108b1('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa
108b2('bum): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag
108b3('bum): gis sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'bel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ 
108b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs ba ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mid de ma mchis pas
108b5('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pam mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'dus bdag gis myig yor lta bu'i bar len pa'i phung po
108b6('bum): ldi'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma
108b7('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ 
108b8('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchi
109a1('bum): so/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs brtan lnga bu'i zhi ba'i len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan
109a2('bum): 'das de ltar bdag gis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la
109a3('bum): ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming di'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming
109a4('bum): de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis smig rgyu lta bu'i 'a bar len pa'i
109a5('bum): phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i
109a6('bum): 'phel ba dang / 'grib bam dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len
109a7('bum): pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na// 
109a8('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba
109b1('bum): dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag
109b2('bum): par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ 
109b3('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom
109b4('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung bo lnga'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na
109b5('bum): bdag gis sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la
109b6('bum): ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad
109b7('bum): du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dben
109b8('bum): pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dben pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su
110a1('bum): ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
110a2('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan
110a3('bum): 'das bdag gis zhi ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis zhi ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma rimigs/ yang
110a4('bum): dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis// thug pa ma mchis
110a5('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na// ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
110a6('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis skye
110a7('bum): ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma
110a8('bum): mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug
110b1('bum): bam mchis/ byin gyis brlangs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'gag pa mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma mamigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan
110b2('bum): 'das de ltar bdag gis 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom
110b3('bum): ldan 'das 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabase pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming
110b4('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sa 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'gring bam ri rags
110b5('bum): yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta rabadag gis 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'gri bab ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chung
110b6('bum): sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba ba mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis sde/ 
110b7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'du
110b8('bum): bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'gri
111a1('bum): pam dmigs yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du ga dgas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par 'du bgyi ma mchis pa'i ming de
111a2('bum): yang gnas pa ma mchis// thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ 
111a3('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom
111a4('bum): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming
111a5('bum): du gradags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma ma ches/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
111a6('bum): mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
111a7('bum): rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang
111a8('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma
111b1('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
111b2('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis
111b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbying
111b4('bum): kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byi na gyis brlabs pa ma mchis ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchi sau// 
111b5('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong
111b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin nyid kyi 'brel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom
111b7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
111b8('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bac+doMs de ltar bdag
112a1('bum): gis yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa pa dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
112a2('bum): 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis// 
112a3('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi gnas nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
112a4('bum): de ltar bdag gis chos kyi gnas nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ bang dub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
112a5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thu gang ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming ngam mchis pas/ de ltar na ming
112a6('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma
112a7('bum): mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdag
112a8('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos skyon med pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ bin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ 
112b1('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma
112b2('bum): dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu ma mthong na/ bang
112b3('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
112b4('bum): ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
112b5('bum): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mtho nga ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'jig rten par
112b6('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
112b7('bum): 'das 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ra ma tri
112b8('bum): pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'phel ba
113a1('bum): dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs
113a2('bum): yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'das byas dang 'dus mapas kyi chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis
113a3('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bag
113a4('bum): gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
113a5('bum): bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub
113a6('bum): sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma
113a7('bum): mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchi
113a8('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
113b1('bum): bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming
113b2('bum): gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ 
113b3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang
113b4('bum): ma 'ongs pa mi mchis pa dang ngad ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste// de la ji zhes bgyi zhen/ de ni 'dus ma bgyis te 'dus
113b5('bum): ma bgyis ni 'das pa ma lags so// ma 'ongs pa ma lag so// da ltar byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa
113b6('bum): ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ 'asum bgyis pa po de yang gang zhe na/ gang la skye ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis/ 'jig pa ma mchis ste/ bcom ldan
113b7('bum): 'das bdag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
113b8('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub seMnga'i dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba
114a1('bum): dang 'grib bam dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi bye ma sred kyi de bzhin gshegs
114a2('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // 
114a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi ngag 'dun dang bcas pa
114a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib ba ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // ba com ldan 'das bdag gis bang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
114a5('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas
114a6('bum): 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khamos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de
114a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag
114a8('bum): bar rje su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
114b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho
114b2('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang du
114b3('bum): sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje sum mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
114b4('bum): bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma
114b5('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI'i klung gi bye ba snyed kyi de bzhin gsheg ba dag
114b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grob pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje sum
114b7('bum): mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
114b8('bum): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de
115a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'angal ba dang
115a2('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 
115a3('bum): gang zhig brtags par bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ dge 'dun gyi ming
115a4('bum): de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyi sa brlabs pa ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis// thug pa ma mchis/ byin
115a5('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar ni maung de gnas pa ma mchis/ thu ga pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom
115a6('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi
115a7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
115a8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma
115b1('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ 
115b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de yang gzugs
115b3('bum): sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna'am/ lce'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ 
115b4('bum): sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
115b5('bum): 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam pa ra shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ 
115b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
115b7('bum): tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
115b8('bum): gyis cher ba 'am/ si'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ na mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du
116a1('bum): byed ngam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tsher ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ 
116a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ 
116a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid steng po nyid dam/ chen de stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam
116a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma nga tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngam/ de rab med pa stong pa
116a5('bum): nyid ngam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad ste nga ba nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa
116a6('bum): nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
116a7('bum): sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ 
116a8('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par
116b1('bum): pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ 
116b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
116b3('bum): rnams kyis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dbar na/ rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjed du ma mchi so// sgyu ma zhwa
116b4('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgra brnyan zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rig yor zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjed du ma
116b5('bum): mchis so// smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// du zla zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
116b6('bum): sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ste dper na/ nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sa zhes
116b7('bum): dgye ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// chu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// me zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// rlung zhes
116b8('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces pa'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
117a1('bum): du ma mchi'o// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis/ 
117a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi gnas nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis// chos skyon med pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming
117a3('bum): ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
117a4('bum): du ma mchi so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
117a5('bum): du ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni
117a6('bum): gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// tshul khrims shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang
117a7('bum): brjod du ma mchis so// tingange 'dzin ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par grol
117a8('bum): bzhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes
117b1('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
117b2('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchi so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyir mi
117b3('bum): 'ong ba'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i
117b4('bum): ming ni gang gis kyang brjed du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi sa so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
117b5('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchiso// byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa gyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
117b6('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchi so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba'i ming gling gis kyang brjod du ma mchis// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi ba'i ming yang
117b7('bum): dge ba'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag ma mchis pa
117b8('bum): zhi ba'am ma zhi ba'am/ dben pa'am mi dben pa dang / dngos po'am dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pas/ bac+doMs bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/ de
118a1('bum): srad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pam mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
118a2('bum): bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i
118a3('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de ni gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
118a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjo da / rnam pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / ma tshan ma 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tshe// sems zhum par 'gyur
118a5('bum): yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing 'gyod pa ma mchis la// mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir mi
118a6('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs par bgyi ste/ gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshulo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
118a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges
118a8('bum): 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce la
118b1('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sgra la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des dril gnas par mi
118b2('bum): bgyi'o// des ro la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des reg la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas
118b3('bum): par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i rnam par shes pa gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges yid kyi rnam par
118b4('bum): shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par
118b5('bum): mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi ba gyi'o// des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi 'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
118b6('bum): nges mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
118b7('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges lus kyi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges yid kyi 'dus
118b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi/  bu'i khal la gan la ci'i phyig da me'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
119a1('bum): des rnam pa'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyi'o// nges rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges 'du byad la gnas
119a2('bum): par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// ngas reg pa la
119a3('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des srang pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi
119a4('bum): nges skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rga shi lag rnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom lda na 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste
119a5('bum): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs
119a6('bum): so// tshe rab tshor bas stong snga/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
119a7('bum): kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis snga
119a8('bum): 'du shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du sheso// 'odu byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byang ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na'ang stong
119b1('bum): pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par
119b2('bum): shes pa ma lags rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang
119b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshe/ nges gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges 'du shes la gnas par
119b4('bum): mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de'ang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste/ mig gi stong pa
119b5('bum): nyi gang lags pa de'ang mig ma lags/ mig las gud na la nga sdong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ mig nyid kyang spong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba rna bas stong ste/ rna ba'i
119b6('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba ma lags/ rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna snas stong ste/ sna'i stong pa nyid gang
119b7('bum): lags pa de yang snga ma lags/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce lces stong ste/ lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
119b8('bum): lce ma lags/ lha las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lce'o// lus lus kyis stong ste/ lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags/ lus las
120a1('bum): gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid yid kyis stong ste/ yid kyi steng pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid ma lags/ yid las gung
120a2('bum): na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang steng pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las
120a3('bum): gung na'ang stong pa'i nga ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzug so// sgra sgras stong ste/ sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sgra ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang stong
120a4('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri dris stong ste/ dring stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dri ma lags/ dri las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma
120a5('bum): mchis te/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ra ros stong ste/ ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ro ma lags/ ro las gud na yang stong pa ring ma mchis par
120a6('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg reg gis stong ste/ reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg pa ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid
120a7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos chos kyis stong ste/ chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags/ chos las gud na yang stong pa nyidadi ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang
120a8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa
120b1('bum): ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gung na'ang spong pa'i dam mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang spong ba nying stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes parda
120b2('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gung na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
120b3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang
120b4('bum): lags pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
120b5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa nga'ang lha'i rnam par shes par lags
120b6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang steng pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi
120b7('bum): rnam par shes pas steng ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gung na stong pa nyid ma mahA
120b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
121a1('bum): stong pazhi gang lags pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gu na 'ang stong bzhi ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang song
121a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te rag pa ma lags/ mig gi
121a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus de reg pas stong
121a4('bum): sta/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
121a5('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg sna'i 'dus te reg bas stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i snang ba nyid gang lags
121a6('bum): bde'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te / ba las gu na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg por
121a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na stong pa nyid ma
121a8('bum): mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas steng ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
121b1('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
121b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ yid kyi
121b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid pa mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
121b4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
121b5('bum): ba ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi ga gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid
121b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor brna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus
121b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma
121b8('bum): mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab sna'i 'dus te reg
122a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas song ste/ sna'i 'as te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong banyid gang lags pade'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te
122a2('bum): ba'i rkyen gyis tsher ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid steng pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus
122a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
122a4('bum): tshor ba ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce'i ra dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang
122a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
122a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags padi yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor 'am lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
122a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod
122a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma
122b1('bum): lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gung na 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus
122b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis steng ste/ si'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sa'i khams ma lags/ sa'i khams las gung na
122b3('bum): 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang si'i khams so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong sde/ chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
122b4('bum): chu'i khams ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang stong ba nyid ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chu'i kham so// me'i khams
122b5('bum): me'i khams kyis stong ste/ ma'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang me'i khams ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ me'i kham
122b6('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma lags/ rlung gi
122b7('bum): khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams na mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ nam mkha'i
122b8('bum): khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang na mkha'i khams ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ na mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
123a1('bum): kyang mamakha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam
123a2('bum): bar shes pa'i khams ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang steng pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'am
123a3('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ma rig pa ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sto
123a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
123a5('bum): ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas s+ho/ nga ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
123a6('bum): rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs ming dang
123a7('bum): gzugs kyis stong ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid
123a8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzug so// skye mched drug skye mched gis stong ste/ skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang skye mched drug ma lags/ skye mched drug las
123b1('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa reg pas stong ste/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg pa ma lags/ 
123b2('bum): reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags/ 
123b3('bum): tsher ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa sred pas stong ste/ sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sred pa ma lag/ 
123b4('bum): sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa len pas stong ste/ len pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
123b5('bum): yang len pa ma lags/ len pa las gud na'ang stong ba nyi dam mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid bsrid pas stong ste/ srid pa
123b6('bum): stong pa nyid gang gang lags pa de'ang srid pa ma lags/ srid pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba skye bas steng ste/ 
123b7('bum): skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang skye ba ma lags/ skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi rga shis stong ste/ 
123b8('bum): rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rga shi ma lags/ rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// 
124a1('bum): ldan pas rnam grangs ngesan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes sa kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la srung ba / mam bral garnas par mi bgyi'o// 
124a2('bum): bye la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// reg pa la gnas par
124a3('bum): mi bgyi'o// tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// sreng ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
124a4('bum): rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
124a5('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin+da pas stong ste/ sbyin pa'i pha
124a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
124a7('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye
124a8('bum): ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdul khrims kyi pha
124b1('bum): tu phyin pas stong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gung na
124b2('bum): 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
124b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
124b4('bum): 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi na ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol
124b5('bum): tu phyin pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ba zod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa'i
124b6('bum): bkyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi
124b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
124b8('bum): stong ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
125a1('bum): gung na'ang stong pa nying ma mchis ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
125a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
125a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang
125a4('bum): lags pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma la gas// bsam gan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gu ngan 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi ba
125a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang / sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom lda na 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
