125a6('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
125a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags
125a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
125b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
125b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i
125b3('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis steng ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dran pa
125b4('bum): gzhag pa rnams ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang steng ba nyid steng pa nyid kyang dran
125b5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam gra ngas des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
125b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
125b7('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ yang dag par spong ba
125b8('bum): rnabs kyi steng pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ yang dag par spang ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid
126a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
126a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
126a3('bum): ba'i la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'od ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
126a4('bum): rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
126a5('bum): rkang pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grang sa nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
126a6('bum): chen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
126a7('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po lnga la gnas par ma bgyi ste// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'od ltar dpe sa sa sa
126a8('bum): ste/ dbang po rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ dbang po rnams kyang stong pa nyid steng pa nyid
126b1('bum): kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams la gnas par mi
126b2('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad
126b3('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong s+t+waM/ stobs rnams kyi stob pa nyid gang lags pa de yang stobs rnams ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud
126b4('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
126b5('bum): ngos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
126b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdud la gnas par mi gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub
126b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid
126b8('bum): mchis te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du
127a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ bya dud kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi da lel tu phyin pa la
127a2('bum): spang ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lam lam gyis stong ste/ lam gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
127a3('bum): labar lags/ lam las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ lam yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127a4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'pha gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi ba gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
127a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
127a6('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
127a7('bum): ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 
127a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
127b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
127b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma lags/ bsam
127b3('bum): gtan rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
127b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams chad
127b6('bum): med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ tshad mod pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshad med pa rnams ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshad med
127b7('bum): rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad
127b8('bum): med pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gzugs med
128a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i skems par 'jug pa rnams gzug
128a2('bum): mang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags
128a3('bum): gzugs mang ba'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
128a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gzug
128a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
128a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis steng ste/ rnam par
128a7('bum): thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang steng
128a8('bum): ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna
128b1('bum): ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
128b2('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
128b3('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas
128b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ca stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
128b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis
128b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
128b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i
128b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mngan ma meng ba dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
129a1('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spong ba med par lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
129a2('bum): rang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar
129a3('bum): pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor ba'i rtsa
129a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par pabagyi'o// bcom lnga na 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
129a5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par mi rgyu ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
129a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs
129a7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
129a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
129b1('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i
129b2('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ 
129b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
129b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par mib gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
129b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
129b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang so so yang dag par
129b7('bum): rig pa rnams ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par
129b8('bum): rig pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas
130a1('bum): par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang sring rje chen po la gnas par
130a2('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos steng ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang
130a3('bum): lags pa de dang / snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma lags/ de yang snying rje chen po ma lags/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid pa
130a4('bum): mchis te/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen de'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
130a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams po chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
130a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
130a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
130a8('bum): rnams ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
130b1('bum): ma 'dres pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas snga
130b2('bum): mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa
130b3('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi/ gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gnyi su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
130b4('bum): yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags/ yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yi ge rnams kyang
130b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnam so// bcom ldan 'ad sa rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
130b6('bum): yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas
130b7('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
130b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnam so// bac+doMs
131a1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i / mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
131a2('bum): gzhan yang dang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
131a3('bum): lngar dang 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gung
131a4('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangasangs nabyang chu
131a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan
131a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du'an/ bcom
131a7('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi
131a8('bum): rnams las gung na'ang stong ba nyid pa mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sem
131b1('bum): dnga' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
131b2('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs
131b3('bum): mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mi
131b4('bum): rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131b5('bum): phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ tsher rab mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas
131b6('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
131b7('bum): tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom
131b8('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes
132a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i de/ 'du shes mi rtag go nas bgyi bar gnas par mi gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mi rtag pa
132a2('bum): nying 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
132a3('bum): mchis te/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
132a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
132a5('bum): nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ 
132a6('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
132a7('bum): 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom
132a8('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi 'gyi'o// des shes pa
132b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid
132b2('bum): rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las
132b3('bum): gud na'ang stong ba nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
132b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
132b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug ba sngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du
132b6('bum): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs sdug
132b7('bum): bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba
132b8('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
133a1('bum): par bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe/ bcom ldan 'das de
133a2('bum): 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tsher ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tsher ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tsher ba sdug bsngal ba ma lags/ tsher rab sdug bsngal ba nyid
133a3('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tsher ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
133a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rab sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ 
133a5('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal
133a6('bum): ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du
133a7('bum): shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
133a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal
133b1('bum): le zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi dgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba
133b2('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang
133b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'dra byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
133b4('bum): nga'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas pa ra mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes brgya
133b5('bum): bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsnga lo ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis steng ste
133b6('bum): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma
133b7('bum): mchis te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chung sems
133b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
134a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
134a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs bdag med
134a3('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
134a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
134a5('bum): tshor ba bdag med do nas bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ 'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor babadag med pa nyid tshor ba de dag byed pa nyid kyis stong sa
134a6('bum): ba bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ tshor rab bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyang
134a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
134a8('bum): tshe/ tsho rab bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
134b1('bum): ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med pa nyid 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
134b2('bum): yang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes
134b3('bum): bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 'du shes padang / med do zhes
134b4('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag med do/ zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe
134b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag med pa nyid 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
134b6('bum): 'du byed bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag med
134b7('bum): ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar
134b8('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas pa rimi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
135a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi steng pa nyid gang lags pade
135a2('bum): 'ang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma ljags/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid seng
135a3('bum): ba nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dzar
135a4('bum): shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la
135a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs ni'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis steng sde
135a6('bum): gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong
135a7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
135a8('bum): gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
135b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ri 'di ltar tshor ba zhi nyid tsher bzhi pa nyid kyis steng ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags/ tshor bzhi pa nyid las gung
135b2('bum): na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyang steng pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tsher bzhi pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135b3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tsher bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar
135b4('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyid 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis steng ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid
135b5('bum): gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ni ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchi sa te/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyi
135b6('bum): kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 'du
135b7('bum): zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
135b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byeng zhi ba'i
136a1('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed ni banyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs denges na/ byang chub sems
136a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes
136a3('bum): bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes bzhi pa nyid rnam par shes pa zhi pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa
136a4('bum): nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes bzhi pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa nyid nyid las gud na 'ang stong pa nyid ma ma ches ste/ rnam par shes bzhi pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa
136a5('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes zin pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
136a6('bum): par shes bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gzugs
136a7('bum): stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
136a8('bum): gang lags pa de'ang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid/ 
136b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes ra
136b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tsher rab stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid dor ba stong pa nyid kyis steng ste/ 
136b3('bum): tshor ba steng pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tsher ba stong pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tsher ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
136b4('bum): kyang tsher ba stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de san/ byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i te/ tsher ba stong
136b5('bum): ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes 'gyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ do ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
136b6('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes stong pa
136b7('bum): nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
136b8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed steng zhes
137a1('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed steng pa nyid kyis steng ste/ 'du byed steng pa nyid kyi steng pa
137a2('bum): nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed stong pa nyid pa lags/ 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid pa mchis te/ 'du byed steng pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid
137a3('bum): ngo/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong nge zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
137a4('bum): nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes
137a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa
137a6('bum): stong pa nyid las gud ra'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs ngas na/ 
137a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
137a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de na
137b1('bum): 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid pa lagra
137b2('bum): gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
137b3('bum): rnam grangs des na/ bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// ngas she
137b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ tsher ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba
137b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid tshe rab mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tsher rab mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang legs pade yang tshor ba mtshan ma meng pa nyid ma lags
137b6('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
137b7('bum): rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges
137b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mtshan pa med
138a1('bum): pa nyid 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes mtshan meng ba nyid pa lags/ 'du shes mngan
138a2('bum): med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub
138a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / 
138a4('bum): byed pa dza pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis
138a5('bum): stong 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyi nga gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed mtshan ma med po nyid ma lags/ 'du byed pa tshan ma med pa nyid las gudan
138a6('bum): 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
138a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
138a8('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid rnam par shes pa
138b1('bum): mngan ma med pa nyid kyis steng ste/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pade'ang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma med
138b2('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
138b3('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
138b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
138b5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
138b6('bum): gang lags pa de'ang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags// gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid
138b7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
138b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste
139a1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
139a2('bum): de yang tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tsher ba smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba smon pa
139a3('bum): med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnga/ tsher ba smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar
139a4('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
139a5('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid 'du she sa smon pa med pa nyid kyis spong ste/ 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes
139a6('bum): smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid las gung na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyang spong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa med pa cid
139a7('bum): // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar
139a8('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa med do// zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
139b1('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid
139b2('bum): ma lags/ 'du byed smin pa med pa nyid las gu na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
139b3('bum): nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi
139b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi 'gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par
139b5('bum): shes pa smon pa med pa nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa me dpe nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa smon pa
139b6('bum): med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa smon pa rang yid gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smon med nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa
139b7('bum): smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa
139b8('bum): med de zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
140a1('bum): / dben no 'os bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dber ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi steng pa nyid
140a2('bum): gang lags pa de'ang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs
140a3('bum): dbar ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ gzugs dper ro zhes bgyi bar
140a4('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rab dben no zhes bgyi bar ga nas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
140a5('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dben pa nyid tshor ba dang na bi nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma lags
140a6('bum): tsher ba dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bang
140a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tsher ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
140a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dben pa
140b1('bum): thos stong sa / 'du shes ben pa cing kyi stong panyid gang lags pa de 'ang 'du shes ben pa nyid pa lags/ 'du shes ben pa nyid las gu na yang spong banyid ma mchis te/ 
140b2('bum): dben pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa
140b3('bum): 'du shes dben ne nas bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dberan ni zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du ne ra/ bca
140b4('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed dbe pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang du byed dben pa nyid
140b5('bum): lags/ 'du byed dben pa nyid las gud na'ang steng pa nyid pa mchis te/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do// bca
140b6('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i te/ 'du byed dben de zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o
140b7('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par
140b8('bum): shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam
141a1('bum): par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do// 
141a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben de zhes bgyi bar gnas par
141a3('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bca
141a4('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma
141a5('bum): mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas
141a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
141a7('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid
141a8('bum): gang lags pa de'ang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
141b1('bum): grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
141b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi
141b3('bum): dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos
141b4('bum): kyi dbyings kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
141b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzha na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
141b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'i ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid cho
141b7('bum): skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
141b8('bum): tau/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
142a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon pa med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bang du sems dpa' sems dpa' ngan pas
142a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i
142a3('bum): mtha' stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis de/ yang dag pa'i
142a4('bum): mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
142a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gan sa par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheni pos shes
142a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon pa
142a7('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
142a8('bum): che/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
142b1('bum): byin pa las spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba
142b2('bum): dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du shes la gnas na/ de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
142b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir
142b4('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
142b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba
142b6('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par
142b7('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la sgom
142b8('bum): par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal
143a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyib
143a2('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis mig la gnas na/ de mig mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sa pa
143a3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba la gnas na/ de rna ba mngon pa
143a4('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu ba gyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyi sa sna la gnas na/ de sna mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
143a6('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
143a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce la gnas na/ de lce mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
143a8('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang
143b1('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus la gnas na/ de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
143b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid la gnas na/ de yid
143b3('bum): mngon par 'du dgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mo spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
143b4('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
143b5('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na
143b7('bum): de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
143b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sgral gnas na/ de sgra mngon par 'du dgyi ba skye
144a1('bum): kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i
144a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis dri la gnas na// de dri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
144a3('bum): spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal ta bab tu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas// bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la
144a4('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis re la gnas na/ de re mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char
144a5('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg la gnas na/ de reg mjed par
144a6('bum): 'dubagyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodapa
144a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chos la gnas na/ de chos mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144a8('bum): pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du nan/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ 
144b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
144b2('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
144b3('bum): dgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
144b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi
144b5('bum): mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rna ba'i rnam par sheso pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
144b6('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
144b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par
144b8('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
145a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bla drug gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lha'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ 6de lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par
145a2('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
145a3('bum): nga'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon
145a4('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
145a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi rnam
145a6('bum): par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
145a7('bum): dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha
145a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
145b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ dmig kyi
145b2('bum): 'das de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
145b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ den pa'i
145b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
145b5('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i
145b6('bum): de reg pa la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
145b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dag tu byi ba dang / dag gos gyibal gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa la
145b8('bum): gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'dubagyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa'
146a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ Shabs mi ma khas pas/ ga tu gyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi 'dus nga reg pa la
146a2('bum): gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
146a3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas
146a4('bum): de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyai/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i
146a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms
146a6('bum): par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub
146a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
146a8('bum): kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
146b1('bum): mi skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ khag tu ba da ga
146b2('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyi rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
146b3('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
146b4('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
146b5('bum): ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
146b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
146b7('bum): gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyong ngo // bcom ldan
146b8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyib
147a1('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis der rab mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
147a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
147a3('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdog gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe ra ba mngon par
147a4('bum): 'dubagyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la sbyong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a5('bum): chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin bar mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab
147a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sa'i khams la gnas na
147a8('bum): de sa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
147b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chu'i khams la gnas na/ de ru'i khams mngon
147b2('bum): bar 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
147b3('bum): che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis me'i khams la gnas na/ de me'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kye/ shes rab kyi
147b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
147b5('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yi da kyis rlung gi khams la gnas na/ de rlung gi khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
147b6('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
147b7('bum): ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis na mkha'i khams la gnas na/ de na mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ 
147b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / nga
148a1('bum): gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol
148a2('bum): tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ 
148a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
148a4('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
148a5('bum): mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir ba gyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ma rig pa la gnas na/ de ma rig pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
148a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas
148a7('bum): pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol
148a8('bum): tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
148b1('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'dubagyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
148b2('bum): byin pa la mi skyed // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
148b3('bum): bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ming dang gzugs la gnas na/ de ming dang gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
148b4('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi
148b5('bum): mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis skye mched drug lag nas na// de skye mched drug mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
148b6('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
148b7('bum): thobs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg pa la gnas na/ de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes ra
148b8('bum): kyi rol tu phyin pa la mi skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal bya ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi rol 'byin pa 'i sbyor ba / thabs mi
149a1('bum): mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'dud gyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
149a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
149a3('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis srid pa la gnas na/ de sred pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
149a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba
149a5('bum): dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis len pa la gnas na/ de len pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la mi
149a6('bum): spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang
149a7('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis srid pa la gnas na/ de srid pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
149a8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la
149b1('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis skye ba la gnas na/ de skye ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
149b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rga shi la gnas
149b3('bum): de rga shi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sbyod do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149b4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ 
149b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur bar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal de bang
149b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
149b7('bum): yid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sbyong ngo // 
149b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
150a1('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ be tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
150a2('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong
150a3('bum): pa'i thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de bzod pa'i pha rol
150a4('bum): tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
150a5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis
150a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de// 
150a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag
150a8('bum): bir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes ra
150b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
150b2('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
150b3('bum): kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi
150b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms pa ra 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
150b5('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
150b6('bum): brgya pa// / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
150b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis nang stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la skye
150b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
151a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis pi stong pa nyid la gnas na/ di phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
151a2('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
151a3('bum): mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis pi nang steng ba nyid la gnas na/ de phyi nang steng pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol
151a4('bum): tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
151a5('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de stong ba nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
151a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// bdag
151a7('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chen po stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
151a8('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir
151b1('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
