225b2('bum): spong na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du shes pa ni
225b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pa thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes
225b4('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
225b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du shes mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
225b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
225b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal tebang tub sems
225b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed bode zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
226a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod dam ngan pa la skyes
226a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
226a3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du bye bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na man
226a4('bum): ma la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mir khas pas/ 'du byed
226a5('bum): ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ra/ thabs mi pa la
226a6('bum): pas 'du byed mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
226a7('bum): pas/ 'du byad dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi
226a8('bum): mkhas pas// 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro dang phyir pa la spyod pa'i
226b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char po shes rab kyi pha rol tu par
226b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mkhan pa la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
226b3('bum): re la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can
226b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs mi ma khas pas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
226b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thebs mi mkhas pas/ rnam bar shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spang nam cha pa la spyod
226b6('bum): de bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i de/ thabs ri mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar skyeng
226b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang tub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i ta/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi
226b8('bum): bar skyed na ma na ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnga sha
227a1('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che dpe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i pa/ thabs
227a2('bum): mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyide pa la skyed pa'i
227a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom lnga ra 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
227a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyodan mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
227a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa na pa la spyod de// bco ldan
227a7('bum): 'angs gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pras/ mig sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod namangan
227a8('bum): ma la skyed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ mig bdag ces bgyi ba
227b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la sbed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig bdag med ces
227b2('bum): bar spyad na mtshan ma la skyed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig
227b3('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa chen ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
227b4('bum): pas/ mig ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyo da // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
227b5('bum): sbed pa'i de/ thabs pi mkhas pas/ mig dben zhe sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
227b6('bum): na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub se
227b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i te/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
227b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar sbed na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcosapa
228a1('bum): / te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la skyed do//

228a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
228a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba bdag med ces bgyi bar skyed dmatshan pal

228a6('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnab ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod dpa
228a7('bum): ma la spyong ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rab dben zhes bgyi bar spyang yang
228a8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod nad mtshan pa
228b1('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
228b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snga mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

228b7('bum): sna bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i
228b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
229a1('bum): pa'i ma/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
229a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i te/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snang ben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che pe shes rab kyi pa
229a3('bum): piyin pa la sbed pa'o cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' der po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
229a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
229a5('bum): yin pa la skyeng ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
229a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ser
229a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub
229a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
229b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
229b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
229b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
229b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
229b5('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
229b6('bum): lce mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
229b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
229b8('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
230a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
230a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
230a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
230a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa sa/ lus bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
230a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus zhi zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
230a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
230a7('bum): 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / 
230a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
230b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skye
230b2('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
230b3('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ yid bad zhes bgyi bar sbed na mtshan
230b4('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang sdug bsnga
230b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i/ thabs
230b6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ yid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbeng
230b7('bum): cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

231a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sarba
231a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ying dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal dbyang dung
231a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bco pa ldan
231a4('bum): 'das gal ta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyodan

231a6('bum): mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi
231a7('bum): mkhas pas/ gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

231b1('bum): bal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
231b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

231b7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra rtag ces bgyi
231b8('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas// sgra mi nag ces bgyi
232a1('bum): bar skyed dmatshan pa la sted de/ bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i thabs pi mkhas pas
232a2('bum): ba bas bgyi bar skyed na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma thabs pa babs pas/ sgra sngag
232a3('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbeng ba'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas
232a4('bum): sgra bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs
232a5('bum): mi khas pas/ sgra bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na ma na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
232a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

232b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

232b8('bum): pas/ dri bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
233a1('bum): e thabs mi mkhas pas/ dri zhi zhes bgyi bar spyodan pa can ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

235a5('bum): tshethabs mi mkhas pas/ chos mi dben nis bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
235a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

235a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi
235b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi rdar
235b2('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i
235b3('bum): bathabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnar shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du pan
235b4('bum): spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom
235b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// mig gi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi ba
235b7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi
235b8('bum): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ 
236a1('bum): // thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
236a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
236a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das
236a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi ba
236a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma thabs mi mkhas
236a6('bum): pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na par na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
236a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
236a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed de// bcom ldan
236b1('bum): 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
236b2('bum): la sbed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par
236b3('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
236b4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
236b5('bum): pa'i chu/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i rnam parashes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skye dado// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa
236b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par she/ sa pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbed de// bcom
236b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar sbyad
236b8('bum): mtshan ma la skyed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snga'i rnam par shes pa
237a1('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
237a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
237a3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
237a4('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snga'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
237a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbeng ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

237b3('bum): rol du phrin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ babs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

242b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mthabs
242b2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
242b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shre
242b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
242b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tra phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spongar
242b6('bum): mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'o 'dus
242b7('bum): reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
242b8('bum): mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
243a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems
243a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod nam ngan pa la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bang
243a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod dmatshan pa la spyod / 
243a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bad gces bgyi bar spyad/ 
243a5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i phyi/ thabs mi mkhas
243a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
243a7('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
243a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snyed kyi pa mim yangs lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
243b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
243b2('bum): gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben nas bgyi bar spyod da mtshan pa
243b3('bum): la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rta gces bgyi bar
243b4('bum): spo na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid
243b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
243b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sepas dpa'
243b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das ka
243b8('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar sbed dmangan pal
244a1('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// thabs mi mkhas pas/ sid kyi 'dus
244a2('bum): reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i ma thabs
244a3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 'phyin pa
244a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ yod kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
244a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'du sa te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // 
244a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal tebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben
244a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha
244a8('bum): pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
244b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
244b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba bde zhes bgyi bar
244b3('bum): spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi
244b4('bum): 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
244b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa sa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
244b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag
244b7('bum): med ces bgyi bar sbed na mtshan ma la smod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

245a1('bum): pa la skyed pa'ing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod napa tsha mal spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
245a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis chos pa dper nas bgyi bar

245a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
245a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab rtag pa ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

245a7('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
245a8('bum): pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

246a4('bum): ba mi nag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

249a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco pa ldan 'a
249a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga / thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar
249a3('bum): spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi

249a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha sa pas/ sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang

255a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod da mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
255a8('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// / 
255b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byung dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
255b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam pa
255b3('bum): shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
255b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
255b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod nam tshan ma la spyod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub
255b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong // 
255b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs bda'as
255b8('bum): dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
256a1('bum): pas/ ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi
256a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang tub sems dpa' sem
256a3('bum): dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
256a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha sa pas/ ming dang gzugs ni zhes bgyi bar spyod rab ngan pa la
256a5('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi khas pas/ ming dang gzug
256a6('bum): po'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa/ 
256a7('bum): ming dang gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pal
256a8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa
256b1('bum): rol du phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
256b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
256b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
256b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
256b5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
256b6('bum): pas/ skye mchod drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
256b7('bum): la skyong po'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
256b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma le spyong ngo // ba
257a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye ma ched gu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyodan
257a2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug dben zhes bgyi
257a3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug mi
257a4('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
257a5('bum): pas/ reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la spyod pa'i
257a6('bum): che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
257a7('bum): ba'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
257a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
257b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
257b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa ra 'a la bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
257b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
257b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg kham zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'a ngas gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
257b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
257b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
257b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bor spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
257b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
258a1('bum): // sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ khabs mi mkhas pas// tshor ba bde zhes bgyi ba spyod da pa napa la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems
258a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
258a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tsher ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang tu ba sems dpa' sanga'
258a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
258a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro dpa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das
258a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// 
258a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ che ro ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
258a8('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ cher ba
258b1('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
258b2('bum): pas/ sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
258b3('bum): mkhas pas/ sred pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
258b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ sred pa bde zhes bgyi bar spod na mnyan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang rku ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
258b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sreng ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sar
258b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ sred pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyad na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sa
258b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sred pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyad namangon ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das
258b8('bum): gal te byang du ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sred bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// ba
259a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sred pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod dpa
259a2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
259a3('bum): mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sred pa mi deben zhes bgyi bar spyad
259a4('bum): mtshan pa la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na ba la spyod pa'i te/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ len pardag ces
259a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi malas
259a6('bum): pas len pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
259a7('bum): mi mkhas pas/ len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
259a8('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ len pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
259b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i6/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ len pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
259b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// len pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ len pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' se
259b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ len pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
259b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ len pa deben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
259b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ len pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
259b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mngon pa la
259b8('bum): skyed // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa pi rtag ces bgyi bar skye
260a1('bum): na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa
260a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi ma byas pas/ srid
260a3('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi
260a4('bum): mkhas pas/ srid pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtsha na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
260a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
260a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thubs mi mkhas pas/ srid bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se
260a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
260a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
260b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
260b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
260b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
260b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye ba bde zhes bgyi
260b5('bum): bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
260b6('bum): mkhas pas/ skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
260b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye bo bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
260b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
261a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad
261a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
261a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyodan
261a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ latu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// 
261a5('bum): skye ba mi dben nos bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
261a6('bum): tsho/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
261a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa
261a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
261b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
261b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thubs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
261b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
261b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
