261b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
261b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rga shi mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
261b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
262a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sa rtag ces bgyi
262a2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha
262a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mthu
262a4('bum): bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
262a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
262a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod nam
262a7('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin po'i pha rol
262a8('bum): tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
262b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
262b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i to/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sprin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
262b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ngo/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
262b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod dam ngan pa la
262b5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdul khrims kyi
262b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
262b7('bum): tshe thabs so mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyeng ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ngan
262b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan
263a1('bum): 'das gal te byang dubasabs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khribs kyi pha rol tu phyid pa
263a2('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i pa thabs mi
263a3('bum): mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab
263a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod dmachen pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
263a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha sa pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi zhes brgya
263a6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
263a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
263a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
263b1('bum): na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
263b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // / 
263b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang rku ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu pani pa bde zhes bgyi
263b4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod
263b5('bum): ba'i pha rogang phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
263b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhos pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
263b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
263b8('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
264a1('bum): / zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i te/ thabs pibabs pa
264a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
264a3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin po shes rab kyi pha rol
264a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
264a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
264a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
264a7('bum): ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ 
264a8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
264b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
264b2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
264b3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
264b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la
264b5('bum): skyed pa'i thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
264b6('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
264b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mchen
264b8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
265a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
265a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
265a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do// bcom ldan
265a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs me mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265a5('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
265a6('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpo
265a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
265a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
265b1('bum): babadag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
265b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
265b3('bum): spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub
265b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
265b6('bum): na mtshan pa la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha
265b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ 
265b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
266a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
266a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pa/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod/ 
266a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces
266a4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
266a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spro dan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
266a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
266a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
266a8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'icha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyodan
266b1('bum): mngad pal skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
266b2('bum): pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha
266b3('bum): pas nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
266b4('bum): che thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces pa gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
266b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mim khas pas/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
266b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
266b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar
266b8('bum): spong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong
267a1('bum): / pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
267a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
267a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
267a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// btsa ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
267a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das
267a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi b.rade spyod na mtshan ma la
267a7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
267a8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi
267b1('bum): stong pa'i bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
267b2('bum): mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod dpacan pa la skyed do// bac+doMs gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha bram
267b3('bum): mkhas pas/ phyi sdong pa'i bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan po la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
267b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod dmatshan pa la skyed do// rjes gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
267b5('bum): pathabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid ni zhes bgyi bar spyod nam can ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
267b6('bum): pa la sred pa'i se thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi steng pa nyid bzhi zhes bgyi bar sbed na ma tshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
267b7('bum): thabs pa mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang du ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sa thabs mi mkhas
267b8('bum): pas/ pi snang pa nyid ping ben zhes bgyi bar spyod dmatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de bang du ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha re la phyi pa la skyed pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ pi nang sdeng
268a1('bum): / pacing nag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i phababs mi mkhas pas/ pi dang sre
268a2('bum): pa nyid pi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rmi/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ pi 'ang snang pa 'ang
268a3('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol// 'phyin pa la sbed pa'i pha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid snga
268a4('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa can pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma thabs mi pakhas pas/ phyi rang snang ba'i
268a5('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs pa mkhas pas phyi
268a6('bum): dang stong pa nyid bdag mod ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
268a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyin
268a8('bum): stong pa nyidas ni zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa
268b1('bum): nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang du ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa'i
268b2('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sdong ba'ing stong pa nyid rtag
268b3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod dpa na pal sbed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
268b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod ro ba can pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong panying stong pa nyid bde zhes ba
268b5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal da byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pathabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa'i stong pa'i
268b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi khas pas/ stong pa'i nga stong pa'i
268b7('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na ma chan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong panyid
268b8('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i ma thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa'ing
269a1('bum): / zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mim bas pas/ stong pa
269a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
269a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spang ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
269a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ 
269a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
269a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
269a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
269b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // 
269b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
269b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen pa stong pa nyid ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
269b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // 
269b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi
269b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa
269b7('bum): nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
269b8('bum): mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
270a1('bum): la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas// don dpa pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pa la de byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' ri pa she
270a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang du ba sems dpa' sams dpa' rin po shes
270a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi ma khas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
270a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam bstang ba nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// 
270a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
270a7('bum): sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
270a8('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben
270b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ don
270b2('bum): dpa pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ 
270b3('bum): bas po sa ga / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
270b4('bum): 'dus pas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na pa ngan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
270b5('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus pas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
270b6('bum): dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu ben pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ba de zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyang ngo // bam ldan
270b7('bum): 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus pas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
270b8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ 
271a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
271a2('bum): tu pi pa la spyod pa'i pa/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus pas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sepra
271a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad de// bcom ldan 'das gal te
271a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mo zhi zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshan pa la
271a5('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems rab 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'das pas
271a6('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs
271a7('bum): mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa re
271a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang
271b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa tan mal spyod do// 
271b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal tu bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
271b4('bum): sbeng na ma chad pa la sbed // bcom ldan 'das gal dbang / ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa la spyod po'i / thabs mi ma shes pas/ 'dus pa bas ste
271b5('bum): 'ing bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// ba ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nape shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'i / thabs
271b6('bum): mkhas pas/ 'dus mangs stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar sbed na ma tan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi par 'du par ba
271b7('bum): la skyed pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang tub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
271b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga / thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dasam pas stong pa nyid bzhi zhes bgyi bar snad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal btu bas
272a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la skyed /

272a3('bum): ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

272a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod nam tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
272a6('bum): bal spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon

274a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas
274a6('bum): pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa la
274a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub
274b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
274b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
274b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes brgya
274b4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
274b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
274b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mi chen ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
274b8('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
275a1('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ 
275a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te dang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ra/ thab
275a3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
275a4('bum): tu phyin pa la sbeng ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ cho sa thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtsho na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
275a5('bum): dpo' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
275a6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams
275a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ 
275a8('bum): zabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
275b1('bum): be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
275b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod

275b4('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi

275b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
275b7('bum): te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dber zhes bgyi bar

276a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
276a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

276a5('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

276b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'icha/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan

276b7('bum): mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas

279b8('bum): bar spyod na mtshan po la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa
280a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

280a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

280b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
280b2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
280b3('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
280b4('bum): bAs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
280b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
280b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
280b7('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thab se ma mkhas pas/ yang dag par spang ba rnams bdag
280b8('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang
281a1('bum): par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod dam tshan ma la sbyong // bcod ldan 'das gal de bang du ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du yin pa spyod
281a2('bum): pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod dam ngan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' dan po shes rab kyi pha rol
281a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
281a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
281a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba/ mas mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod nam ngan pa la spyod do// 
281a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
281a7('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
281a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
281b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
281b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
281b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
281b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag
281b5('bum): bod ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spang ba'i te/ thabs
281b6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
281b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sar
282a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom
282a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod dam chen pa la
282a3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar
282a4('bum): skyong na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ dab sa
282a5('bum): rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
282a6('bum): che/ thabs mi mkhas paso/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
282a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
282a8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bdag med ces 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
282b1('bum): dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rtsa/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

282b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i te/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
282b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar
282b5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya ngachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
282b6('bum): stobs rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
282b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
282b8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

283a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba
283a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

283b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

283b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ tha'as mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar
283b8('bum): sbed na mtshan ma la spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag
284a1('bum): rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs

284a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

284b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

284b8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
285a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

286a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang drung sems dpa' sems
286a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

286a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dmaso ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

286b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

286b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
286b6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ tshang mang po rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
286b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang du ba sems dpa' sems
286b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal teb
287a1('bum): / sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas/ chang med pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// @
287a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i re/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod dam dzan pa la spyod de// 
287a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal de bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa
287a4('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ babs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams dan
287a5('bum): nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mtha
287a6('bum): bas/ tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
287a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems
287a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
287b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
287b2('bum): pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod nam tshan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
287b3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
287b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i sgo mas par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
287b5('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i
287b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
287b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
287b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi
288a1('bum): zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshan pa la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i / thabs mi ma khas pas// gzun
288a2('bum): mang ba'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ba pe shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
288a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs mang pa'i stobs par 'jug pa rnams mi dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
288a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i'acha/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad // bcom ldan 'das
288a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed de/ 
288a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes
288a8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
288b1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnam bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
288b2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
288b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i rtsa/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
288b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // ba
288b5('bum): ldan 'das gal dbang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bas mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams dben
288b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
288b7('bum): pas/ rnam por thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyang do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
288b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te bang
289a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par
289a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par/ thabs
289a3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
289a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ithibs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
289a5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang ba'i tshethabs mi
289a6('bum): mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdeg ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
289a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdage med ces bgyi bar spyod
289a8('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ 
289b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
289b2('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
289b3('bum): gar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'adra/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dpan
289b4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa/ 
289b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces brgya
289b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'angs gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam
289b8('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gapa byang chub sems dpa
289'a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// de ltar de dag dran pa
289'a2('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rdeg pa dang
289'a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag go/ 
289'a4('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug pa sngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med de zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
289'a5('bum): mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / yang
289'a6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med
289'a7('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang // yang
289'a8('bum): dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug go zhes bya
289'b1('bum): bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug
289'b2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni
289'b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug
289'b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis/ nga ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// rdzul phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'a
289'b5('bum): de ltar nga dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkeng
289'b6('bum): ba rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyu
289'b7('bum): dbang po rnams mi rtag go zhes pa bar ston/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar sngon/ dbang pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya
289'b8('bum): bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang da ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ sul bstan pa de dag kyang / dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog pa
290a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa'i dang / mang pa
290a2('bum): smon pa med pa bde nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa
290a3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod // bco pa ldan 'das gal bang chub
290a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mchod pa med pa dang / sngor
290a5('bum): pa med pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
290a6('bum): skyed pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod namangan ma la spyad / 
290a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
290a8('bum): nyidi dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ongs gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dan po shes
290b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// 
290b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
290b3('bum): smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
290b4('bum): mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / ma tshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal te byang
