290b6('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa
290b7('bum): rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
290b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' khyen
291a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa chen ma la spyod // 
291a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag
291a3('bum): dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i nga/ thabasam ma das
291a4('bum): pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
291a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/ thabs mi mkhas pas// mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyodan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
291a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshar ma la spyod de/ 
291a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams dber zhes
291a8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par
291b1('bum): ba rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi
291b2('bum): mkhas pas/ ting 'dzin rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
291b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291b4('bum): baM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
291b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ ting 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal
291b6('bum): zhes bgyi ba re spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa
291b7('bum): mkhas pas/ ting 'dzin rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
291b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu
292a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu ben pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nga 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar sbed
292a2('bum): ska nga / bcopa ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs me sekhas pas/ tingange 'dzin rnams po 'ams bgyi ba
292a3('bum): spring dpang pa la sbeng ngo // bco mo ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' ngan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i nga/ thabs pa mkhas pas 'ja
292a4('bum): rnams dbar shes bgyi bar skyed dam char pa la spyod de/ ba pa ldan 'das gal te bang du bsams dpa' sems da 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal skyed pa'i/ 
292a5('bum): pi mkhas pas deng 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar skyed na par ra pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sapas dpa' ngan po shes rab kyi
292a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i pa/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo bas rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mngon pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sa pas
292a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod ra mngon pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'a
292a8('bum): gal te byang tab sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnapas bde zhes bgyi bar spyod rapa da ma la
292b1('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sde rnams sdug bsngal la
292b2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i de/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo
292b3('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na pa ngan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 'byen pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
292b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgornapas bdag med ces bgyi bar spyad dam pa/ pa la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya rab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol yin pa la
292b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa bakhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na pa ngan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang dab sems
292b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabasim mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spong ngo // bco pa lngan
292b7('bum): 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ra/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgra rnams dben zhes bgyi bar sbedan
292b8('bum): mtshan pal sbyong // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgra
293a1('bum): mi dban nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sra
293a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin ga/ gas pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la sbed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang du ba sems dpa' sems dpa'
293a3('bum): sa rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod de 'cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod namaldan pa la skyed bcom ldan 'das la
293a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha sa pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bar
293a5('bum): dbyi bar spyod na pa chen ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
293a6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de pe gas
293a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
293a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
293b1('bum): mal skyed de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
293b2('bum): bcu'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mdzar ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs pa
293b3('bum): mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab kyi pha
293b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de banin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dbar zhes gyi bar spyong na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
293b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' che po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa dbang nas brtse
293b6('bum): spyod na mtshan pa la spod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal de byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jig
293b7('bum): rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod dmatshan ma la sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
293b8('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye
294a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams banga'as bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te dang dang sems
294a2('bum): sems dpa' ra pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la skyed pa'i ha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod nam tan me la spyod pa
294a3('bum): gal te byang chab sapas dpa' sems dpa' ngor po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag cas bgyi bar spyod dpa pa
294a4('bum): spong ngo // bcopa ldan 'das ka pa bang chab sems dpa' sapas pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro la tu len pa la spyod pa'i pa/ tha bas mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag par ches
294a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod da mtshan pa la spyad ngo // bcom ldan 'das ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs pa pa
294a6('bum): pas mi 'jigs pa rnamasa'i zhes bgyi bar spyod nam tshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad
294a7('bum): cha thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sapas dpa' che po shes rab kyi
294a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa
294b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
294b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyong ra ba na ma la spro// 
294b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag cu
294b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyong do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ra/ tha
294b5('bum): mi thos pas/ mem yang dag par rig rnams pade zhes bgyi bar spyod nam / ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang
294b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
294b7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi bakhas pas/ so so
294b8('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
295a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod da mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang ba sems
295a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spong na mtshan pa la sbeng ngo // bcom lngar
295a3('bum): 'das gal te bya dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spro
295a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang
295a5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
295a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
295a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
295a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod
295b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
295b2('bum): la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes
295b3('bum): dgye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying
295b4('bum): rje chen po badra zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
295b5('bum): che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ seng rje chen po bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
295b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
295b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spong da mtshan ma la spong ngo // 
295b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po dben nas
296a1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i
296a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
296a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu
296a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chas pa 'dres pa bco brgyad pi rtag ces
296a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ thabs mi
296a6('bum): mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
296a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
296a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab si ma mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ca
296b1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
296b2('bum): pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
296b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

296b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pa/ la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs pa
296b6('bum): mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
296b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// / 
296b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' te
297a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyad du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod dmigs pa la sbyod ba ste/ byang dub sa
297a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
297a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom mo// zhes bgyi bar spyod na'ang mtshan pa nyid la spyod pa ste/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi
297a4('bum): mkhas par rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
297a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems
297a6('bum): dnga' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te
297a7('bum): byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang dga' ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
297a8('bum): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
297b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes de byin gyis rlob na/ de tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ tshor
297b2('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod do// de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa lnga
297b3('bum): yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
297b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ 'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ 
297b5('bum): de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya nga na dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su
297b6('bum): mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
297b7('bum): 'du byed la mes shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlong pas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga'
297b8('bum): dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'jug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las
298a1('bum): yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pal mes
298a2('bum): 'du shes tu byin gyis rlob na de rnam par shes pa la mos shing / 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga'
298a3('bum): dang / nab dang / 'chi ba dang // mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dzin pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las
298a4('bum): yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// mig la mos shing 'du shes
298a5('bum): byin gyis rmeng na/ de mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin sa rlob pas/ mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ don skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
298a6('bum): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// bral
298a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rna ba la mos shing 'du shes 'byin gyis
298a8('bum): kha bas/ rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
298b1('bum): las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ snal
298b2('bum): mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na de sna la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas sna mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'icha ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
298b3('bum): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yong su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
298b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob nad lce la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ lce mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de// deni skye ba dang / dga'
298b5('bum): dang / nang dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khru ga ba las yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las
298b6('bum): yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che// lus la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de lus
298b7('bum): la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob bos/ lus mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
298b8('bum): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
299a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ yid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod da// dor skye
299a2('bum): dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ri
299a3('bum): 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob ra de gzugs la mes shing
299a4('bum): 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dren pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
299a5('bum): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes ra
299a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na de sgra la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sgra mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga'

299a8('bum): su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dril mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na de dril mos shing 'du

305a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rga shi la mos shing 'du shes
305a7('bum): byin gyis rlob pas/ rga shi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
305a8('bum): mi bang ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
305b1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sbyin pa'i
305b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang mar smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa

305b4('bum): spyod pa'i// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du she/ sa te byin gyis rlob na/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ tshul
305b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spro da de// de ni skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal

311a4('bum): yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ bsam gtan rnams la mas shing 'du shes

323b2('bum): yid kyi khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod / yid kyi khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yi

323b4('bum): yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams smod lam ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid
323b5('bum): khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod// yid kyi khams mi raban zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chos kyi khams la mi spyod de/ chos kyi khams kyi mtshan pa la mi spyod cing
323b6('bum): chos kyi khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyad/ chos kyi khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi smod
323b7('bum): chos kyi khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams pa'i'is bya bar mi spyod// chos kyi
323b8('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyad/ chos kyi khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyad/ chos kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
324a1('bum): kyi khams ston pa yong ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams smon pa med ces byabar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams dben zhes bya bar mi skyed/ chos kyi khams
324a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma spyod de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / yid kyi rnam par gos pa'i khams gas pa
324a3('bum): spyod/ yod kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
324a4('bum): mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khangs zhi gsu bya bar
324a5('bum): mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar ma spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bor ba spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi snang
324a6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes
324a7('bum): ba'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi skyong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dpon 'as bya bar mi spyod/ mi
324a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sa ri khams la mi spyod de/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan mo la mi spyod cing / sa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa khams
324b1('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sil khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams bdag med ces
324b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sau khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sir khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi skyed/ si
324b3('bum): khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sau'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar
324b4('bum): spyod/ sa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ si'i khams mi dbar zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chu'i khams la mi spyod de/ chu'i khams kyi mngon pa la mi spyod cing

324b7('bum): chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyong/ chu'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mtshan pa med ces bya bar mi sno
324b8('bum): chu'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod / chu'i khams smon pa maud ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mi dben zhes pa par mi spyong pa'ang / re'i kham
325a1('bum): // la mi spyod de/ me'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / me'i khams rtag ces bya par mi spyod/ me'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod

325a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spro 8/ me'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyong / me'i khams mi na
325a5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod dang chu gi khams la mi spyod de/ rlung gi kha mas kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rlung gi khams rtag/ ces bya bar mi spyod/ rlung gi khams ces bya bar mi smong

325b3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ na mkha'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ na mkha'i khams me zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ na mkha'i khams stong

325b5('bum): khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyor/ na mkha'i kham sa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod nas pa'i khams ben zhes bya spyod/ nam pa'i khams mi dran zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes
325b6('bum): pa'i khams la mi spyod de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
325b7('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams

326a1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod// dza shes pa'i bam pa stong pa 'i spyod/  shes pa'i khangam tha~M zhes bya ba 'i spyod/ ma pa shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i

326a6('bum): ma rig pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mo rig pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
326a7('bum): rig pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi rig pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'du byed la mi spyod de/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'du byed rtag ces bya ba ma sbyod

326b7('bum): shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa ben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi dper zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs la ra skye nga ming dang gzug
326b8('bum): kyi mtshan ma la mi skye nga / ming dang gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs bar zhes bya bar ri spyod/ ming dang gzugs sngas
327a1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi spyong / ming dang gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs ni zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ ming dang gzu

327a8('bum): spyod/ skye mched drug dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye mched drug mi dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong ba dang / reg pa la mi spyod de// reg pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing // reg brtag ces bya bar mi spyad

328a1('bum): mi spyod/ sred pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sred pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sred pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sred pa mar nar med ces bya bar mi spyod sred pa

329a1('bum): la 'i spyod / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la pi spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin

329a7('bum): spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes

329b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod rdul brims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

329b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa mngan pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyong
329b4('bum): dul khrims kyi pha rol/ du yin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dber zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod
329b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar na pa la mi spyod/ cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya
329b6('bum): bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya
329b7('bum): bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi zhes bya bar
329b8('bum): spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces pa
330a1('bum): bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i phar
330a2('bum): phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ram
330a3('bum): tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan pa la mi spyod cing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
330a4('bum): phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pa rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson

330b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan pa la mi spyod cing // bas
330b2('bum): gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyod/ 
330b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag pang
330b4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsapa gdar gyi
330b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsapa pa/ tad gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces
330b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mo spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gratar gyi pa
330b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 
330b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi
331a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de spyod

331a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol

336a1('bum): yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi man nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
336a2('bum): nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
336a3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong
336a4('bum): pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag/ med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi skyed/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya ba
336a5('bum): spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi// dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
336a6('bum): spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya
336a7('bum): bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 
336a8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med
336b1('bum): stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag
336b2('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
336b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod// dngos
336b4('bum): bo med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
336b5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ ngonyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ngo bo nyid
336b6('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong po nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
336b7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar
336b8('bum): mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces
337a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ ngam cang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod// dzas nyid stong pa nyid smod pa grod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rngan cid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod 'o/ 
337a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
337a3('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i thaza
337a4('bum): stong pa nyid ba de zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa 'jim nyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po rmed pa'i ngog nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngos
337a5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med sa pa bar mi smra / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bye bar mi spyod/ dngos po med po'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid pa
337a6('bum): zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
337a7('bum): stong po nyid mtshan mo yid ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po mang po ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces byab
337a8('bum): mi spyod/ dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
337b1('bum): mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams la mi spyod de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya
337b2('bum): bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes
337b3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes
337b4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi
337b5('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam sa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa / bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
337b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag po rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya
337b7('bum): bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 
337b8('bum): dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong
338a1('bum): // ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyong / yang dag par
338a2('bum): spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ yang dag por spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma steng zhes bya bar mi
338a3('bum): spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang
338a4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
338a5('bum): rnams la mi spyod de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba ra mi spyod/ rdzu 'bral gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar
338a6('bum): mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi sbyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
338a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'bral gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'bral gyi rkang
338a8('bum): rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba mi spyod / rdzu 'phrul gyi gang ba rnams
338b1('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa bad ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben
338b2('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la mi spyod de/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dbang po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi
338b3('bum): spyod/ dbang po rnams me rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po
338b4('bum): rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spro da dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams
338b5('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi
338b6('bum): spyod/ dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la mi spyod de/ stobs
338b7('bum): rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing // stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams sdug
338b8('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams pa zhi zhes bya
339a1('bum): par mi spyod/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stongs rnams mtshanam
339a2('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi dben zhes
339a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan sa la mi spyod cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
339a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes pa por mi spyod
339a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya
339a6('bum): bar mi sbyong/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi stong zhes bya
339a7('bum): bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa
339a8('bum): yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhesu/ 
339b1('bum): bar mi spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya bar
339b2('bum): mi sbyong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'de zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug
339b3('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
339b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar mi
339b5('bum): spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dang mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags
339b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
339b7('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ban zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang
339b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshon ma la mi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bde/ 
340a1('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
340a2('bum): bden pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
340a3('bum): rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan

340a5('bum): rnams smon po med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags par bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa 'baden pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bsam
340a6('bum): gtan rnams la mi spyod de/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
340a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag
340a8('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi
340b1('bum): sdong zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi
340b2('bum): spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyo ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la
340b3('bum): mi spyod de/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mo spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya

340b5('bum): pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar

340b7('bum): med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad maud pe rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i slo
340b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces pab
341a1('bum): / spyod// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod// gzun
341a2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
341a3('bum): ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/

341a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzu gas med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma ma de ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
341a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben
341a7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan ma
341a8('bum): la mi spyod cing / rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
341b1('bum): ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni zhes
341b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
341b3('bum): thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar
341b4('bum): thar pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyad/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang
341b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mthar gyis
341b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i

342a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
342a2('bum): pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces
342a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar
342a4('bum): mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa na mas smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis ga nganas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi
342a5('bum): spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
342a6('bum): po la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
342a7('bum): dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i
342a8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal/ 
342b1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
342b2('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam
342b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes
342b4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi steng zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
342b5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma
342b6('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyong/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
342b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar mi
342b8('bum): spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mngon par shes
343a1('bum): parnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mngon pa shes pa rnams nag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mirtag ces bya bar mi spyong / mngon par shes pa
343a2('bum): rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi sbyong/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag
343a3('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyong / mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod
343a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma 'o bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa
343a5('bum): rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mdo na par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par
343a6('bum): shes pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ting 'dzin rnams la mi spyod de/ ting 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ting 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
343a7('bum): ting 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ ting 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams bdog ces bya bar ma
343a8('bum): spyod/ tingange 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams ste/ 
343b1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
343b2('bum): ting 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams mi
343b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi spro rnams la mi spyod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi
343b4('bum): spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi nag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
343b5('bum): spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spro da/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs
343b6('bum): kye sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod
343b7('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces
343b8('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyong/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi spyod
344a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
344a2('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
344a3('bum): stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhi
344a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
344a5('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyodade bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma med
344a6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de
344a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod pa
344a8('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya
344b1('bum): bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jig
344b2('bum): pa rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
344b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyong/ 
344b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi' jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jig sa pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyong pa dang / so sa
344b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyad
344b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
344b7('bum): mi skyed/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes
344b8('bum): bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya
345a1('bum): par mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sos yang dag pa
345a2('bum): rig pa rnams sngon pa yong nas bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang
345a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la mi spyod de/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sri
345a4('bum): chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sring rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi
345a5('bum): spyang/ snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje che na po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sing rje chen po stong zhes bya
345a6('bum): bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma mang ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po sman
345a7('bum): ba yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sa
345a8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces
345b1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
345b2('bum): pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bya bar
345b3('bum): mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
345b4('bum): pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mo stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod
345b5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces
345b6('bum): bya bar mi sbyong/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyong/ sangs
345b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// / 
345b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa
346a1('bum): gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs
346a2('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong panyid medade/ stong pa nyid
346a3('bum): kyang tshor ba tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du shes ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du shes med/ 'du shes las gud na'ang stong
346a4('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin/ pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
346a5('bum): na yang 'du byed med 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyi da med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed// 'du bya de nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
346a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid
346a7('bum): kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig med/ mig las
346a8('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mig mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna ba med/ rna ba las gud/ 
346b1('bum): 'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sna med/ sna las gud na yang
346b2('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lce med/ lce las gud na yang stong pa nyid
346b3('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus med/ lus las gud na yang stong pa
346b4('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang yid med/ yid las
346b5('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid yi/ de nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
346b6('bum): gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i stong pa'i nga gang yin pa de yang
346b7('bum): sgra ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sgra med stong pa nyid kyang sgra sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
346b8('bum): na yang dri med/ dri las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ steng pa nyid kyang dri dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ro ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang med
347a1('bum): ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ror nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na la
347a2('bum): reg med/ reg las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
347a3('bum): gud na'ang chos med/ chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig khams
347a4('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig gi khams med// mig gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams mig gi khams nyid kyang
347a5('bum): stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs kyi khams med/ gzug
347a6('bum): kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi khams rnam par shes pa'i
347a7('bum): khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ mig gi rnam
347a8('bum): par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
347b1('bum): na ba'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med/ rna ba'i khams las gungad na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
347b2('bum): pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams/ rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa da'ang sgra'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sgra'i khams
347b3('bum): med/ sgra'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra'i khams sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang
347b4('bum): yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na 'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang
347b5('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par/ shes pa'i khams/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i khams kyi stong
347b6('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sgra'i khams med/ sna'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams
347b7('bum): sna'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri'i khams med/ dri'i khams las
347b8('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i
348a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na 'dra sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang
348a2('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i khams pa yin
348a3('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i khams med/ lce'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams lce'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ro'i khams kyi stong pa
348a4('bum): gang yin pa de'ang ro'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro'i khams med/ ro'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ro'i khams/ ro'i khams nyid
348a5('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa 'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i
348a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
348a7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na 'ang lus kyi khams med/ lus kyi khams las gud na
348a8('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khams/ lus kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / reg gi khams ma yin/ stong pa
348b1('bum): las gud na'ang reg gi khams med/ reg gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par
348b2('bum): pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lus kyi rnam par
348b3('bum): shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi kha
348b4('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
348b5('bum): kyang yid kyi khams yid kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yid pa de'ang chos kyi khams ma yin// spong pa 'di las gung na yang chos kyi khams
348b6('bum): med chos kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
348b7('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung ni'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yid
348b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na'ang sa'i khams med/ sa'i khams las gung na'ang stong pa'i
349a1('bum): / stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams saM'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid // chu'i khams kyi stong pazhing gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams ma yin/ steng pa zhing las gung na'ang chu'i khams med/ chu'i Sha
349a2('bum): las gung na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na'ang de'i
349a3('bum): khams med/ me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma sri
349a4('bum): stong pa nyid las gu na'ang rlung gi khams med/ rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// namakha'i khams kyi sngo
349a5('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de'ang na mkha'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma mkha'i khams med/ na mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
349a6('bum): nam mkha'i khams na mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam
349a7('bum): par shes pa'i khams med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gu na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
349a8('bum): ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa ma rig
349b1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa
349b2('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed 'du byed nyid kyang / stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
349b3('bum): gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ming
349b4('bum): dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ming dang ga zugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang
349b5('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzu gas ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
